poem:
Title: "On Financial Dreams Deferred"

Amidst fiscal turns
and towering debts,
A cadence of concern
an echo frets.

Hunt's ambition, clad in gold,
Scorched in public figures cold.
Pledged cuts— promises sold,
In unyielding budgets, behold. 

Through the labyrinth of pounds,
Hope unbound,
A political prowl resounds -
Yet, upon the stilts of sterling,
Dreams are found.
